trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Providence
There were no other sightings in Providence on or around November 19th 2005
Summary: orange sphere shaped object floating across the back yard
divs: Sighting Detailswe were sitting in living room at the time watching a movie .my nephew and my son spotted a round orange ball floating across the backyard at first we thought they were just board and being funny until they got scared.so we looked and sure enough it was real what ever it was. we have only woodlands and swamp behind our house so we ruled out lights from nieghbors.the object floated around about 5 min or so and then it just disappered.it was about the size of soccor ball and was about 3ft above the ground.about 20ft from the back door. we have since moved away
